name: HORACIO GONZALEZ ALEMAN
membership: colaborador academico en  Farm Europe (www.farm-europe.eu), Asociacion Profesional relaciones Institucionales ( www.apri.es)
goal: asesoria y consultoria en el sector agroalimentario, destinada tanto a asociaciones y organizaciones del sector como a empresas. Se trabaja especialmente en los campos de politica agraria, comercial, normas tecnicas, promocion y calidad, innovacion, medioambiente.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Business and Industry, Communication, Competition, Consumers, Customs, Digital economy and society, Economy, finance and the euro, Education and training, Environment, External Relations, Food Safety, Fraud prevention, Institutional affairs, International co-operation and development, Public Health, Research and innovation, Single market, Taxation, Trade
euInitiatives: politica de calidad agroalimentaria, politica de innovacion, normas tecnicas agroalimentarias, promocion agroalimentaria, alimentacion y salud, politica agraria comun, politica comercial, sostenibilidad y clima
